it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.probe
Class GlimpseAbstractProbe

java.lang.Object
  it.cnr.isti.labse.glimpse.probe.GlimpseAbstractProbe
All Implemented Interfaces:
GlimpseProbe
Direct Known Subclasses:
MyGlimpseProbe
public abstract class GlimpseAbstractProbe
extends java.lang.Object
implements GlimpseProbe

This class represent a generic implementation of the interface GlimpseProbe.
It provides the abstract method: sendMessage(GlimpseBaseEvent, boolean)
that can be extended if needed.

Version:
3.2
Author:
Antonello Calabrò
